hero.title: Mobile Car and Truck Detailing.
hero.subtitle: Where the shine is just the beginning

about.title: Dignified Service Provision
about.description: Our commitment is to provide quality and excellence.

luxoBasic.title: Luxo Basic
luxoBasic.description: Discover our Luxo Basic package, the essential service for your vehicle's care. We offer detailed interior and exterior cleaning to make your car look impeccable. A complete and convenient service, designed to meet your basic detailing needs.
luxoBasic.interiorList1: Cleaning of central dashboard and central console
luxoBasic.interiorList2: Vacuuming of carpets, seats, and trunk (if empty)
luxoBasic.interiorList3: Cleaning of door panels and sills
luxoBasic.exteriorList1: Complete exterior hand wash with shampoo
luxoBasic.exteriorList2: Cleaning of rims, tires, and fender wells

luxoPremium.title: Luxo Premium
luxoPremium.description: Elevate your car's shine with our Luxo Premium package. This comprehensive detailing service includes advanced interior care and a machine-applied Carnauba wax for superior gloss and protection, keeping your vehicle looking its best for months.
luxoPremium.interiorList1: Cleaning and hydration of central dashboard and central console
luxoPremium.interiorList2: Vacuuming of carpets, seats, and trunk (if empty)
luxoPremium.interiorList3: Cleaning of door panels and sills
luxoPremium.exteriorList1: Complete exterior hand wash with shampoo
luxoPremium.exteriorList2: Cleaning of rims, tires, and fender wells
luxoPremium.exteriorList7: Machine-applied Carnauba wax for more shine and 3 months protection

luxoFullDetailing.title: Luxo Full Detailing
luxoFullDetailing.description: Experience the ultimate car care with our Luxo Full Detailing package. This comprehensive service goes beyond standard cleaning, offering deep restoration for both interior and exterior, including advanced paint protection and meticulous attention to every detail. Restore your vehicle to its showroom glory.
luxoFullDetailing.interiorList1: Deep cleaning and conditioning of central dashboard and console
luxoFullDetailing.interiorList2: Comprehensive vacuuming of carpets, seats, and trunk (including under seats)
luxoFullDetailing.interiorList3: Hot water extraction/steam cleaning for carpets and floor mats
luxoFullDetailing.interiorList5: Cleaning of door panels, sills, and jambs
luxoFullDetailing.exteriorList1: Multi-stage exterior hand wash with premium shampoo
luxoFullDetailing.exteriorList2: Clay bar treatment for paint decontamination
luxoFullDetailing.exteriorList3: Deep cleaning of rims, tires, and fender wells
luxoFullDetailing.exteriorList5: Exterior window cleaning and streak-free finish
luxoFullDetailing.exteriorList8: Machine-applied premium paint sealant for enhanced gloss and protection (6+ months)
